Based on IRAS KB  this is how the GIRO Payment Plan works:Payment plan alwaysstarts from Mayandends in following Apr(12 months).The payment plan is actually split into 2 parts ProvisionalandActual.Provisionalwill befrom May until 1 month after the NOA is finalised(e.g. NOA finalise in Jun  provisional payment plan ends in Jul).IRAS will useprevious year's NOAto calculate the monthly payment for the provisional payment plan.Actualwill befrom the month after provisional payment plan end(e.g. provisional end in Jul  Aug will be first month)until following Apr.IRAS willdeduct what has been paid from the actual payableto calculate the monthly payment for the actual payment plan.For more info:http://iras.gov.sg/quick-links/payments/giro-individual-income-tax
That's how you can also setup CardUp in May for the first few months of payments.
